name: Block Puzzle: Brain Train Game
description:
A simple but interesting block puzzle game! Come to exercise your brain!
Block Puzzle is our new gem-style cube puzzle game published in 2021. The goal is to lay and destroy jeweled blocks, and if one or more horizontal or vertical lines are filled, the gem blocks in the lines will be broken and eliminated, and now your pressure will be released together. The more you score, the more stress you release and the more excited you get.
Maybe after the end of the daily work, maybe before falling asleep at night, or in every fragmented time, the Block Puzzle game can make you no longer tired, no longer full of stress, but relax yourself , release stress!Hope your relaxing life will be spent with Block Puzzle game!
Our games are very suitable for different types of people. Anyone can have fun from blasting blocks and sharpen their brains in the game with light and lively background music. For different players, we have different suggestions for you.
For beginners of the puzzle games, how to quickly enter the game is the first problem to solve. We have a few tips:
1. Simply put the blocks in the 8*8 grids.
2. Move blocks to create full lines vertically or horizontally and then these lines will be cleared automatically.
3. The more jewel blocks must be placed properly, which is even more challenging! BTW, blocks cannot rotate.
4. When the jewel cubes cannot be placed in the grids, game is over, so you must clear the filled squares as soon as possible!

For a master player of a block puzzle game or someone who wants to become a master, how to challenge yourself to get a higher score is very important. Here are also some tips:
1. Carefully consider how to place different blocks, because each step may lead to different eliminate results, and may even directly end the game process.
2. Try to keep the streak continuously, because the continuous streak and combo will get higher scores and more room.
3. There is no time limit. You can spend more time carefully considering the placement and timing of each jewel cube to get a higher score.
4. Quickly download our Block Puzzle game to explore more high score methods, welcome to share your high score secrets with us!

Why download Block Puzzle game?
Colorful jewel blocks is in the deep-colored background square grid, and the vivid color contrast make game experience excellent.
The game mode without props and time limit is to operate the game entirely on its own brain, which is an exercise of the brain and intelligence;
The sound effects are comfortable, especially when jewels are broken, which are extremely real. And you can hear the sound of birds from time to time, let you have a natural experience.
Easy to play, but getting high scores is not as easy as imagined.

If you have any suggestions or questions for us, please contact us in time and we are look forward to your game feedback!

Challenge this simple, addictive and fun Jewel Block Puzzle Game and get the higher score now!
